Value: When this hero attacks, it will regain a portion of the damage dealt as mana. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 50% of the damage gained as mana. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 75% of the damage gained as mana.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 100% of the damage gained as mana.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - 125% of the damage gained as mana.
